11#include "modules/video_coding/codecs/av1/av1_svc_config.h"
12
13#include <algorithm>
14#include <cmath>
15#include <memory>
16
17#include "modules/video_coding/svc/create_scalability_structure.h"
18#include "modules/video_coding/svc/scalable_video_controller.h"
19#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
20#include "rtc_base/logging.h"
21
22namespace webrtc {
23
24bool SetAv1SvcConfig(VideoCodec& video_codec) {
25 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(video_codec.codecType, kVideoCodecAV1);
26
27 if (video_codec.ScalabilityMode().empty()) {
28 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "No scalability mode set.";
29 return false;
30 }
31 std::unique_ptr<ScalableVideoController> structure =
32 CreateScalabilityStructure(video_codec.ScalabilityMode());
33 if (structure == nullptr) {
34 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Failed to create structure "
35 << video_codec.ScalabilityMode();
36 return false;
37 }
38 ScalableVideoController::StreamLayersConfig info = structure->StreamConfig();
39 for (int sl_idx = 0; sl_idx < info.num_spatial_layers; ++sl_idx) {
40 SpatialLayer& spatial_layer = video_codec.spatialLayers[sl_idx];
41 spatial_layer.width = video_codec.width * info.scaling_factor_num[sl_idx] /
42 info.scaling_factor_den[sl_idx];
43 spatial_layer.height = video_codec.height *
44 info.scaling_factor_num[sl_idx] /
45 info.scaling_factor_den[sl_idx];
46 spatial_layer.maxFramerate = video_codec.maxFramerate;
47 spatial_layer.numberOfTemporalLayers = info.num_temporal_layers;
48 spatial_layer.active = true;
49 }
50
51 if (info.num_spatial_layers == 1) {
52 SpatialLayer& spatial_layer = video_codec.spatialLayers[0];
53 spatial_layer.minBitrate = video_codec.minBitrate;
54 spatial_layer.maxBitrate = video_codec.maxBitrate;
55 spatial_layer.targetBitrate =
56 (video_codec.minBitrate + video_codec.maxBitrate) / 2;
57 return true;
58 }
59
60 for (int sl_idx = 0; sl_idx < info.num_spatial_layers; ++sl_idx) {
61 SpatialLayer& spatial_layer = video_codec.spatialLayers[sl_idx];
62 // minBitrate and maxBitrate formulas are copied from vp9 settings and
63 // are not yet tuned for av1.
64 const int num_pixels = spatial_layer.width * spatial_layer.height;
65 int min_bitrate_kbps = (600.0 * std::sqrt(num_pixels) - 95'000.0) / 1000.0;
66 spatial_layer.minBitrate = std::max(min_bitrate_kbps, 20);
67 spatial_layer.maxBitrate = 50 + static_cast<int>(1.6 * num_pixels / 1000.0);
68 spatial_layer.targetBitrate =
69 (spatial_layer.minBitrate + spatial_layer.maxBitrate) / 2;
70 }
71 return true;
72}
73
74} // namespace webrtc
75
